tasks.title: Config Save Functions
tasks.description: Add save_config() and save_dictionary() functions with tomli_w for TOML serialization. Add load_dictionary_raw() for editor UI. Handle errors gracefully.

tasks.title: Audio Device Selection
tasks.description: Add list_audio_devices() function and device parameter to AudioRecorder.__init__(). Add [audio] section to config.DEFAULTS.

tasks.title: Hotkey Update Method
tasks.description: Add update_hotkey() method that stops listener, re-parses, and restarts. Thread-safe with logging.

tasks.title: Window Detection
tasks.description: Create WindowInfo dataclass and get_active_window() function using win32gui. Add detect_app_type() helper for vscode/notepadpp/terminal/unknown detection.

tasks.title: Term Parser
tasks.description: Create extract_terms() function with regex patterns for camelCase, snake_case, PascalCase, UPPER_CASE, dotted paths. Include stop-word filtering and frequency ranking.

tasks.title: Prompt Merger
tasks.description: Create build_prompt() function that merges base terms + context terms within 224 token budget. Token estimation: ceil(len/4) per term.

tasks.title: Transcriber Per-Call Prompt Override
tasks.description: Modify transcribe() to accept optional initial_prompt parameter. Add update_base_prompt() method. Preserve existing behavior if None.

tasks.title: Dependency Updates
tasks.description: Add tomli-w, comtypes, and psutil to dependencies. Keep existing dependencies unchanged.

tasks.title: Settings Window (tkinter)
tasks.description: Create SettingsWindow class with ttk.Notebook containing General/Hotkey/Dictionary tabs. Modal window with Save/Cancel buttons. Requires T1, T2, T3 completed.

tasks.title: Content Extractors
tasks.description: Create BaseExtractor ABC, FileBasedExtractor (VS Code/Notepad++), TerminalExtractor (UI Automation), GenericExtractor. Factory function get_extractor(). Requires T7 completed.

tasks.title: Tray Menu Update
tasks.description: Add on_settings callback parameter to TrayIcon.__init__(). Add Settings menu item between status and Quit. Requires T4 completed.

tasks.title: App.py Phase 3 Wiring
tasks.description: Create hidden tk.Tk() root, instantiate SettingsWindow, wire tray callbacks, handle config changes with live updates. Requires T4, T5 completed.

tasks.title: App.py Phase 4 Integration
tasks.description: Import context modules and integrate context pipeline into _on_ptt_release(): get_active_window -> extract content -> extract terms -> build prompt -> transcribe with merged prompt. Add [context] enabled config option. Requires T8, T9, T10, T11 completed.

tasks.title: Integration Testing
tasks.description: Manual testing of all features: settings GUI, microphone selection, hotkey remapping, dictionary editor, context extraction, persistence. Requires T6, T12 completed.
